GapFillDragDrop.Title: Present Simple Passive
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. Pasta isn't made with bread but with flour, eggs and water.
2. Are your newspapers delivered to your home?
3. Footballers are bought and sold for millions of Euros.
4. Cricket is played in many countries. It's a popular sport.
5. Breakfast is included in the price of the hotel.
6. I am given the latest results every hour.
7. We aren't expected to get 100% but we have to pass.
8. This dish is cooked in the oven for four hours.
9. Famous actors are paid millions for each film.
10. Coffee is drunk in the morning and after dinner.
